channel.title: ClanSoC
channel.description:
[size=24pt]Position Available - Check end of this post![/size]
[center][img]http://i.gyazo.com/0ca5de055fb93497636d6c8f742d44ed.png[/img][/center]
[url=http://clansoc.net/]ClanSoC - Your Home For Social Clan Management[/url]
ClanSoC is a new hub for managing a clan online. ClanSoC will focus on sociability; we want you to interact! You will be able to arrange events, wars, meetings, and much, MUCH more with this new website.
[b]Completed Features:[/b]
- Coming Soon -
[b]Previews:[/b]
[spoiler=images] Homepage:
[img]http://i.gyazo.com/58521fff9c5062cb0fad5fa0e15d18b8.jpg[/img]
View Post(Rough Draft):
[img]http://i.gyazo.com/3e230530cd3a74611e943534e7fcde0f.png[/img]
Owned Clans:
[img]http://i.gyazo.com/be9a216c9b8167228ba9ab8a35e8d576.png[/img] [/spoiler]
[size=18pt]Like This Project & Want To Help Me Out? Throw This In Your Signature![/size] [code] [center][url=https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=669242.msg4475224]ClanSoC - Social Clan Management Project[/url][/center] [/code]
[size=18pt]Team Position Available:[/size]
Note: All positions are purely volunteer - if you want to be a part of this then it's at your own free will. You have to be committed though and work at my pace. I am fast paced and want things done right, now, and the first time. :)
Graphic Designer - You must show stunning skill in the area of graphic design. You will be in charge of making default images, logos, banners, and more. Shoot me a PM with some work you've done. Don't send me any C4D text with a fractal overlay - this isn't a YouTube channel. Show your true talent.

item.title: ClanSoC
item.dc:creator: @RevengePK RevengePK
item.description:
@RevengePK wrote:

Mr.Draconian:

Why is there no website,did the web host run out or did you change the domain?

Currently putting this project on the back shelf for a minute to revive an old site and finish up with about 4-5 clients. Will be updating the thread though with updates I make every now and then! Domain is still active, just took it down for now.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @RevengePK RevengePK
item.description:
@RevengePK wrote:

Vain_:

just curious as to why you’re using two separate date formats for those posts?

I was experimenting with them and they stored in the database that way.

item.title: ClanSoC
item.dc:creator: @RevengePK RevengePK
item.description:
@RevengePK wrote:

No positions available other than graphic designer. Sorry.

Clan page progress!

Problems:

Searching for a clan doesn’t work for some reason. It won’t display the results using the template system. Idk why, it’s login I’m sure. Will look at it again when I’m not as pissed at it.

Read full topic

item.title: ClanSoC
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

Mr.Draconian:

And are there any other positions other than web development like community managment?

Why would there be a community management position when he’s not hosting a community? He’s making the website for other communities.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

Tip cory:

Don’t make users have two accounts, they’ll never use them. As you know you have to make everything simple as fuck or people won’t use it.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Mr.Draconian Mr.Draconian
item.description:

Why is the main pciture is a picture of the last of us?
I love this game I always play it on my ps3.

And are there any other positions other than web development like community managment?

item.title: ClanSoC
item.dc:creator: @Trugul95 Trugul95
item.description:
@Trugul95 wrote:

May i suggest something ! This is actually a really good idea considering there isn’t really a good Clan CMS available but you should have this set up so people can create there on “plugins” and “themes” also maybe even have two versions a free one and a paid one ! Just a though

Read full topic

item.title: ClanSoC
item.dc:creator: @RevengePK RevengePK
item.description:
@RevengePK wrote:

[quote=“Ruby, post:12, topic:550331”][quote author=RevengePK link=topic=669242.msg4475294#msg4475294 date=1425495692]
Would be cool! Get on skype!
[/quote]
We’ve got a couple league matches tonight but I’ll hopefully be on skype in like 4 hours time… ish :D[/quote]

Cool! I’ll be on for awhile, got fired today. Tehe.

Trugul95:

This is really sexy bro! Keep us updated

Thanks! Will do!

Read full topic

item.title: ClanSoC
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

You should also allow stream embedding too which might be used by some teams/clans etc.

My CSGO team could probably give you some exposure, too. I’ll speak to the other guys and see if they’re interested

Read full topic

item.title: ClanSoC
item.dc:creator: @RevengePK RevengePK
item.description:
@RevengePK wrote:

Vain_:

do you have any plans for clan user groups/clan moderation. such as demoting/promoting/kick (or ban) users, and such things as stickied/locked blog posts etc

Yes! I do!

@Ruby -

Yeah, I’ve scarped the idea. I’ll either use two accounts (EEEEE YUCK) or find a way to connect the two, maybe a “Link to Forum” button. No clue yet.

Homepage Update:

Official Blog Posts:

Small update - adding the clan functionality right now.

Question: Does the design give the “Gaming feel” also, when you look at it do you think “Oh no, ANOTHER gaming community!”?

Read full topic

item.description:

item.title: ClanSoC
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

RevengePK:

Haha. I’m working out how I’m going to get a forum into this thing… I might integrate the MyBB login system with this and just do away with the one thats existing… Suggestions?

The MyBB integrator class that you and I played around with a while ago is incredibly outdated, you’d need to find an updated version or do it on your own accord. Just fyi bruuuuh

Read full topic

item.title: ClanSoC
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

It’s pretty. Looks like it pretty much delivers the features that steam communities can’t offer, because well, it’s Steam…

Read full topic

item.title: ClanSoC
item.dc:creator: @RevengePK RevengePK
item.description:
@RevengePK wrote:

This is being totally built from scratch. I don’t want to release TOO many of the features because they’re ideas I’ve NEVER seen around. Once I get the site online and have established more than an “idea” which is what I classify this as of now I will reveal more of the more sensitive features. What I can say now is:

Clans will have their own customizable hub in which members can communicate with each other and the owners will have an easy way to get news across.

Playing with the blog layout.

Read full topic

item.title: ClanSoC
item.dc:creator: @stCky stCky
item.description:
@stCky wrote:

Interesting, what are some of your planned features?

Are you building this from scratch, or using a framework or similar?

Read full topic
